descriptionHtml:
The Slovak to English translator app also helps as a translator dictionary of words from Slovak to English and English to Slovak!!

(Prekladateľ zo slovenčiny do angličtiny)

SOME KNOWLEDGE ABOUT SLOVAK LANGUAGE:~

Slovak belongs to the Western Slavonic language family and is the official language of Slovakia. Slovak is closely related to Czech, Polish, and the Sorbian languages which are a group of eastern German languages. The synonym for Slovak is Slovak Slovenčina. After the departure of Czechoslovakia in 1993, Slovakia became an independent country from Czech and the languages Czech and Slovak had to drift away. Since then Slovak is an independent language. Around 5.6 million people in Slovakia speak Slovak and also in Canada, Romania, Ukraine, Poland, Hungary, and the USA.

The Slovak language is written in the Roman and Latin alphabet. Traces of the Slovak language were found from the 11th-15th century and of the Czech language from the 14th to 18th centuries. The written Slovak language came into use in the 17th and 18th centuries. Roman Catholics introduced the Slovak language in the University of Trnava with their hymnal and other church books.

SOME KNOWLEDGE ABOUT ENGLISH LANGUAGE:~
English is a Universal language that is very important for this modern era including education, business, political purposes, online and offline shopping, communicating socially with the whole World, and what not. English was first spoken in early medieval England and is a West Germanic language of the Indo-European language family. It is considered an international language in many countries.

In the whole world, the number of English speakers is more than 1.75 billion. English is widely spoken in the Caribbean, Africa, and South Asia, and many other countries in the World.

Countries where English is majorly spoken and native language are~
United States
the United Kingdom
Canada
Australia
New Zealand
Ireland

KEY FEATURES OF THE SLOVAK TO ENGLISH TRANSLATOR APP:~

TEXT TRANSLATOR:~
The Slovak to English translator app is capable of translating Slovak text, letter, word, sentence, paragraph, or copied clipboard text into Slovak to English language or English to the Slovak language. You just need to write down or copy-paste the text you want to translate Slovak.

VOICE TRANSLATOR:~
A wonderful feature of the Slovak to English translator app is the voice translator. First press the microphone icon and speak up the word or sentence you want to get translated. The mic will catch up with the voice and will translate Slovak words into English or English to Slovak.

SPEAKER FEATURE:~
The Slovak to English translator app has an excellent feature of speaker icon that when you translate Slovak or English texts or voices the translated Slovak or English word or sentence is pronounced in their following accent if you press the speaker icon. You people are really gonna love the accent of Slovak and English both.

LANGUAGE BAR:~
The Slovak to English translator app has a language bar where two arrows are shown. By pressing the arrows you can switch between the languages you're working with. In the Slovak, to English translator, you can switch between Slovak and English just by pressing the icon to translate Slovak or English.

The Slovak - English translator and English to Slovak translator is a prominently featured translation tool for your android.
The translation result of the Slovak-English translator / English to Slovak can be shared into your social media accounts like Facebook, Whatsapp, hangouts, messaging, email,
The Slovak - English translator /English to Slovak translator has a very easy user interface for instant translations.
Slovak - English / English to Slovak translator is the most useful for foreigners or for the people studying foreign languages.

The Slovak to English translator (Prekladateľ zo slovenčiny do angličtiny) is developed by PH SOLUTION.

Try the Slovak to English translator App and hope you give it a 5 🌟 rating
descriptionShort: An excellent app to translate letters, words, sentences from Slovak to English
title: Slovak - English Translator Free
